modName: Cleric Armour of the Nine Divines - Beast Guantlet fix
summary: Adds Beast Race compatibility to the guantlets
descriptionHtml:
Small edit using TES5Edit to ActusReus' mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26904/?]Cleric Armours of the Nine Devines - Credo StandAloneMod[/url] , to make the guantlets show up on Khajiits and Argonians instead of showing Steel Guantlets. Unfortunately this does not fix helmets showing up as Steel Helmets on Orcs, Khajiits and Argonians. That would require a new mesh.

The original mod is mandatory. Install it first then overwrite with this mod's esp.

Credit to:
Dejawolf from the TaleWorlds forums for his creation of the Helm mesh and texture.
Rathos also of the Taleworlds forums, for the original mesh & texture's of the Arkay and Crusader helm's.
ActusReus for the original mod.
author: gpthree

files.name: Cleric Armour of the Nine Divines Beast Guantlet fix
